name: DM Simulator (The MUNE)
description:
This DM Simulator borrows the oracle system and additional subsystems found in: https://homebrewery.naturalcrit.com/share/rkmo0t9k4Q

 -- Except simplified into a C# programmed solution using the Unity 3D Game Engine.

Reading the linked website will be sufficient to understand how to emulator works, and begin using it yourself.
